website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular traditional back pillow is recognized for its larger build and quality foam.
pros: Can be ordered in a standard or extra large size
Larger handle included at top of pillow
Filled with blend of shredded memory and support foam
cons: Many customers complained of a mildew odor coming from the pillow

customer_reviews.title: but it came out of 15 minutes in the dryer super well! Worked great for recovery after my surgery
customer_reviews.text: Tip: Toss it in the dryer for a few minutes when you first get it! It arrives compacted down for shipping, but it came out of 15 minutes in the dryer super well! Worked great for recovery after my surgery, but is a bit large to store long-term. Served its purpose nicely, though!
customer_reviews.author: Molly D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this reading pillow. Perfect for reading. No more back pains
customer_reviews.author: prashanthi

customer_reviews.title: Pillow for Breastfeeding in bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for nursing my second child while laying/sitting in bed. I learned the first time around how strenuous it can be on your back. If you're looking for a pillow for that reason, stop looking and click "purchase", because oh my gosh, this is THE breastfeeding pillow. I'm literally feeding him right now while writing this, my back is well supported and I'm comfortable. I leaned back the other day to close my eyes while nursing and smooshed the filling around to get my head a little more comfortable, and it totally works with you. Love this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Starts flat but poofs up fabulously. Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! My apartment is tiny and a couch won't fit. I use this to lay on the floor and watch TV. Love it. I stick a yoga bolster under my knees and it's better than a recliner. Don't be alarmed that it's deflated-looking and flat as a pancake when you first unpack it. I followed the instructions and gave the pillow a massage. It poofed right up! And it was even more full the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: A+ product, Comfy Yet Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on other amazon reviews. There are cheaper products you can buy at Target etc but this is quality. You get what you paid for. I was skeptical because it comes in a small box and when you unwrap it the foam is compressed and it looks like garbage. However with this said, after you take the time to fluff it up and let the foam expand it is amazing. Don't be fooled! I am actually using it as I write this review. A+ product
customer_reviews.author: Meghan R.

customer_reviews.title: Appearance IS Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this pillow. The "filling" does not fill up the case it comes in; mine was about three quarters full after doing everything that was recommended to "plump" it up. It is not/ does not look at all firm like the picture. It is droopy/lumpy. No matter what it costs for postage, I am sending it back for whatever refund I can get - just to make the point. What a terrible purchase, what a rip-off. I cannot understand the good reviews. I was deceived by them, which is very rare for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Emerson-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Hard, and Stinky
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because of great reviews, but I hate this pillow. I bought the XL size because I'm an adult and wanted more cushion. But this pillow feels like it weighs 50lbs and is super cumbersome to move on/off the bed (I actually hurt my shoulder twisting my arm to grab it once). It is also HARD. Everyone considering this pillow should know, it is EXTRA FIRM - feels like a car seat rather than a pillow. It also SMELLS funny - and no, the smell does NOT go away (I've had this for over a month and it still smells like wet dog). I will be donating this and purchasing another that is softer, lighter, and doesn't stink.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Dix

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely wary when I saw the package that arrived. The pillow was super compressed and in a very small box. After a day and a half, it expanded out to full size. It is comfortable and clean, no shedding, no odors. I feel that my money was well spent and I have no problem recommending the pillow to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase.  Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, very firm reading pillow. Soft fabric, nice soft grey in color, I fall asleep sitting up reading almost every night now, I love how comfortable it is and how well it holds me up. The arms seemed a little floppy at first, just work some of the filling from the back into the arm sleeves and it fills them out. I would buy again and I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Hyatte

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my toddler to have as a little place to snuggle up when he looks at his books but I've borrowed it to use during the 3rd trimester of pregnancy in bed. I stack my normal pillows in front of it and it works GREAT to incline slightly, which eases my heartburn and seems to be a comfortable position for me to sleep in. Just like any shredded foam pillow, we took it out of the packaging and kind of pulled the pieces apart and fluffed it up a bit and it was great. It's very comfortable, soft, maintains its shape.
customer_reviews.author: KayS

customer_reviews.title: Read in Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived I thought there must be something wrong. The foam was in hard chunks and didn't nearly fill the fabric shell. Then, as promised on the directions, over the next hours the foam expanded to create a firm, comfortable reading pillow. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: XL is too large, also overstuffed
customer_reviews.text: We bought both the normal size and the XL. The XL is just too large. It is so stuffed that you cannot lean into it at all. It is useless on a twin bed, and even on a King bed, it is just too big (see picture). I'm not really sure who the target market for the XL is. Our five year old daughter is now using it as a seat in her room (literally sitting on it) because it is so firm. Normal sized one is quite good. Would rate the normal sized one 4 stars, but Amazon only allows one review per product even though you have purchased two different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: JGR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Anchor it from behind at its bottom with a pillow, and it will be able to stay supported on its own without having to lean it up against the headboard or wall. I didn’t realize just how big the XL would be, haha, but I really enjoy it, and it provides me the perfect amount of softness and firmness. I’ve been experiencing some lower back pain from time to time due to having to stand for long periods of time on occasion, and this pillow has been excellent for alleviating pressure, and it’s just cozy! I absolutely love it. Don’t forget to register yours for their warranty! I’ll be doing the same tonight :)
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Get it, big and has lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the extra large reading pillow, can neatly packaged and same day delivery , wow can't say enough about that fast delivery, it literally took 12 hours to get once ordered. But the pillow is so big it hangs off my couch, I love it for gaming and helps the pain in my back during long gaming sessions, it is too firm for my liking but after months of using it it should hold its shape, do allow a day or two for the pillow to expand , but I am liking this pillow so far, good buy
customer_reviews.author: ADAM:)

customer_reviews.title: Useful for leg elevation too
customer_reviews.text: Recovering from knee surgery and bought this for reading in bed. But find I am using it mostly for elevating the knee. Setting it flat on the bed and putting the leg so it angles upwards. Really helps with the swelling. Foam is softly firm and readily fluffs into whatever shape you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Wehr

customer_reviews.title: ... assembly is limp where it should be firm and like a rock where it should offer comp fort
customer_reviews.text: This shoddy assembly is limp where it should be firm and like a rock where it should offer comp fort. It never fully expands after the extreme vacuum packaging. I want to return it but the box to UPS it in would cost toomuch. The trashy piece expanded about five times its incoming size . Do not buy this falsely described refuse.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Miner

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite of the 4 kinds I've had.
customer_reviews.text: I love how firm but squishy this is. I hope that makes sense. It is firm enough that it doesn't collapse when you lean against it but squishy enough to not feel stiff and uncomfortable. I really enjoy the high back of the large size. I can lean my head back and have it supported unlike the smaller sizes. The fabric is soft to the touch and feels nice on bare arms. The navy color is a great bonus. It does come vacuum packed and it took 24-36 hours for mine to "fully inflate" the stuffing. The shape needed no manipulation as it "inflated" to it's correct shape.
customer_reviews.author: Musicmom

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This pillow arrived after numerous delays and it came damaged. It comes compressed, so the neat part is you only get to find out after theres no way you can put it back in the box. The XL is huge, unnecessarily so. I hope that other prospective buyers see this, but since I missed it I'm sure others will too. I thought this would be a good safe purchase, when compared to the numerous off-brand clones on Amazon, boy was I wrong. I've always bought the best (tempurpedic) or as cheap as you can get (those target ones) and now I know why.
customer_reviews.author: iamaustin

customer_reviews.title: Fluff it for best support
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful couch back support,great for being 8 months Prego. Had a bit of a chemical smell but not as bad as I've experienced before. I've tried like 6 body pillows and for my size n baby belly and back pain.... I found I sleep besf on an incline... Instead of using 8+ pillows ... I now use this and a small one for extra lower back arch but this has given me decent sleep finally. I also listened to others advice on here that you have to take the time to fluff the memory foam. Once you do you're set, if you don't you won't get full potential. That's my honest review after having it for a week n half.
customer_reviews.author: LalaSol

customer_reviews.title: comfy, supportive backrest
customer_reviews.text: Don't freak out, people! When it comes you won't believe it is a puffy pillow, as it is compressed into a roll. But once you open it and fluff it, leave it to expand, it is just wonderful. Smells for a few days but then the odor dissipates. Very good support to sit up and read in bed. Enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S. Trapp

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I read some of the bad reviews, but I didn’t have any issues with this product. I was concerned because it was so condensed in the packaging, but I let it sit over night and during the day, by the time I got home it filled out completely.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Reading and Watching TV
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for sitting on the bed reading or watching tv. The packaging was a little weird with having to punch the pillow to "fluff" it up. Mine was cold since the weather here was freezing when delivered so I left it to warm up before I attempted to do the fluffing. It was still so smashed down that I gave up and just left it for a few days to decompress by itself and then the only fluffing I did was in the arm rest area. That worked great and I have been using it for a week now and think I might get another one for my husband but in the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: SLW

customer_reviews.title: Best reading pillow...ever
customer_reviews.text: I knew from reading other reviews what to expect when the shipment arrived. Still I was shocked when I opened and unrolled the pillows. At first I thought there was no way it would puff up enough to stand up on its own. Within an hour it was fluffed up and ready for use. The only squishing I had to do is where the arms join the body. The only downside is they are so heavy and HUGE. I knew the dimensions but I wish I had bought the smaller ones. Our bed is a queen size and it is difficult to fit two of the large ones on the bed at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Support & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: RE: Linenspa Shredded Foam Reading Pillow - Extra Large Design for Adults I wasn't expecting for it to be so enormous, however, my new Linespa Reading Pillow totally ROCKS! Due to school closures, "Distance Learning" requires a great deal of time seated planning lessons, answering student emails, and conducting numerous, weekly, online, streaming video meetings - polar opposite to usual. With all of that being said, I LIKE this PILLOW A-LOT! Great support in conjunction with the "Nearpow Adjustable Laptop Bed Stand."  A MUST! So far, I'm extremely pleased with my purchase! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Gardenista

customer_reviews.title: The smell gives me a head ache and eye pain.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful pillow except for the smell. As soon as I opened it, there was a smell that came off. It’s smells like plastic/pesticide smell. It gives me a headache. It states not to machine wash- only spot clean- but I will hose it down with a lot of soap and air dry because the smell is driving me crazy. I like the firmness and comfortability. But the smell, I’m on it right now and my head is just pulsating. Please please get rid of this smell.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi Baby

customer_reviews.title: Head-support Not as Advertised But Fabric is Soft
customer_reviews.text: The fabric feels soft almost a velvety feel, which is great, but the headrest is floppy. It doesn’t match up to the advertised image. Disappointed 😔 about the lack of proper head support, which is why I purchased this instead of the option without the headrest. I hope they will be more honest with their advertising in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia 👸🏽

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: NOT comfortable for after a surgery. It's okay. However, if you are someone who likes a stiff straight up back to read, then it would prob be really comfy for you. I had to slouch, b/c of major surgery, and was really expecting something more snuggly and enclosing and comforting. This is not your pillow if that's what you are looking for. I picture this being something for a stiff person who has their bifocals on and is doing serious reading before bed while their spouse totally ignores them on the other side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Kind of amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was total garbage when I pulled it out of the package. It was vacuum sealed and when I got the plastic off of it, it was so wrinkled and cheap looking, I knew in an instant that I was going to return. BUT I actually read the card that came with it, which said to let it sit for 24-48 hours, so I did. The next morning I came downstairs and it's like it was replaced overnight. The majority of the wrinkles were gone and it had expanded to where it was all fluffed and awesome! It's been on the couch getting used ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: i love it. first when i opened it couldn't imagine ...
customer_reviews.text: i love it. first when i opened it couldn't imagine how these bits and pieces of filling might come together nicely and sharply! but it did it all. now its a supportive nicely shaped with high back. i would recommend it to whoever that s looking for these.
customer_reviews.author: naz

customer_reviews.title: I love the size
customer_reviews.text: I love the size. I’m 5’5 and weigh about 130 pounds and there’s plenty of room to spare. I also like the arms, which support an iPad or a book. It’s very comfortable. The only reason I didn’t give it a higher rating is because it is heavy. I was really surprised about that. I don’t sleep on it, just use it in bed before turning the lights out, so it can be a real pain putting it on the floor and then getting my regular pillows. Otherwise, I like it quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when buying a bed back support pillow about getting something that would hold up and not slump. This does the job, yet is still soft and supportive. Its as good as having a chair in bed, makes doing work on my computer more comfortable. Less stress on my back neck and shoulders than trying to pile pillows that will squish away.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAndTrue

customer_reviews.title: This size would be comfortable for Shaq
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews to determine if I wanted the smaller or larger size. From reviews the smaller size sounded like one for a child. The pillow is huge! The good part: it is comfortable, you can snuggle right into it, you can lay down on one of the arms and comfortably watch TV. You need to put it flat on your bed, not on top of your pillow. It is rather large so good luck storing. This really isn't a complaint, it is just, large. It unfolded and needed almost no fluffing. If it came with that new "smell" it didn't stay long. I am a female, 5'6 and 135 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: SPW

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, versatile, good for students
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much when I got it, bought two more for Christmas gifts for two students paired with the "Avantree Quality Adjustable Laptop Table, Portable Standing Bed Desk, Foldable Sofa Breakfast Tray, Notebook Stand Reading Holder for Couch Floor - Minitable American cherry" also ordered from Amazon. The college students in the fam absolutely loved the combo having the pillow and adjustable desk. Great purchase! I also use it to prop up my feet or under knees when needed. Versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppaholic

customer_reviews.title: Wait for it to fill out!
customer_reviews.text: At first disappointed at failure to fill out quickly. Just had cardiac surgery, in a lot of pain, don't have headboard, and wanted it to work RIGHT NOW! I re-read reviews saying it can take some time, so decided to be patient. 24 hours later (after spending night near baseboard heater) it's cozy and comfy. Love fabric and handle. Drawbacks: While it provides decent lumbar support, wish it was taller and more supportive of my neck. A removable washable cover would be a great feature for linenspa to add in future.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, in fact better than I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, in fact better than I thought it would be, but was not what we were looking for in that was my fault, my wife is very short legged and I was trying to find something to put behind her in her chair, just didn't work out that way for her, didn't send it back, I will simply give it to a child somewhere, or they can sit in the bedroom and watch television, still let me emphasize this is a very good product and well-made. And it's made for attentionally what it says it's made for ,I just tried to use it for something else.
customer_reviews.author: dixie Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Still in recovery and wearing a neck brace (5 weeks) from neck surgery and the pillow is going strong. It needs fluffing every couple of days to get the stuffing back up to the top of the pillow but other than that, the pillow gives me the support I need to deal with the brace. I have another surgery coming up and the pillow will be put back in service. I have no doubts it will handed the next surgery without an issue. If you need a pillow to handle your upright sleeping needs, I recommend this pillow. The pillow is kind of heavy so keep that in mind if you plan to lug the pillow around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Popdee

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. My daughter nurses her little one all day and was having to prop herself up with pillows. She complained of her neck hurting. She's tall (5 ft 10) so I was afraid the neck pillow might be too low, but it's just right! Her 3 year old loves cuddling on it, too, while her mom is tending to the baby. Daughter tells me that the neck pillow has a zipper and can be removed! I hadn't realized that when I ordered it for her. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TanyaBo

customer_reviews.title: I'm am very disappointed that I have to pay over $12 in return ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was uncomfortable and did not support arms while reading. It did not expand adequately even after several days. I'm am very disappointed that I have to pay over $12 in return shipping. How was I to know the comfort level until I tried item?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft Yet Firm
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable reading pillow. Soft, yet firm. It's not quite tall enough to support my head, so I place it on top to my sleeping pillow before use, making it a perfect height. It comes to you compressed, so plump it up thoroughly, evenly distribute the foam & let it sit out for awhile to allow the foam to fully expand... The heavy velour cover appears to be a quality fabric , soft & not "hot" against the body - and the stitching appears to be well done. I really like this reading pillow & would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc R.

customer_reviews.title: The GOOD, the bad, and the ugly
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is a very comfortable reading pillow. If you use it up against a wall or a headboard larger than 16 inches, this is a great buy. My headboard is short, so when I use the pillow in bed the headrest is not exactly functional. The pillow portion is attached with convenient buttons on each shoulder. If the pillow is not against solid semi-tall surface, the pillow flops leaving the neck in an awkward position. The effect is still better than anything I've experienced before, and I would recommend to a friend who loves reading and/or doing work in bed or on the couch. The reading pillow was much larger than I expected, and that was a great surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Strong Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works, but the pillow emanates a very strong chemical smell that has not gone away after over a week of letting it "breathe". I tried to return it, but since it was compressed during shipping it will not fit inside it's original box and Amazon customer service has refused to send me a larger box to return it in. Not sure if my pillow is just defective or if they're all like this (also the cover is not washable).
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for use on beds with memory foam mattresses
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to receiving this pillow. Plumped it up in a no-heat dryer and, that evening, settled with a great book and great anticipation for a comfortable read, and...............it is just not a comfortable sit-in-bed-and-read answer when your bed's got a memory foam mattress! It does not work -- because you and this reading pillow and the memory foam mattress ...s.i.n.k.s... down when your weight's on your sit-apon so you get all pretzeled up. Probably a great pillow under different circumstances. Maybe for reading on the floor...???
customer_reviews.author: LuvGreatGlass

customer_reviews.title: Not so fluffy
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on this thing said to shake VIGOROUSLY and give it a few days to decompress from shipping. I did. Several times. And it barely did anything. Finally I threw it in the dryer a few times and it helped. Compared to the support pillow I purchased in a brick and mortar store that wasn’t compressed, this is junk. My 6 year old is happy with it but he has pretty low standards.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Foam slides!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on my bed in my dorm room as a makeshift lounging chair, as the desk chair in the dorm is incredibly uncomfortable. After a semester of constant use It has held up fairly well. My biggest complaint is that all of the filling has sunken to the bottom, leaving it humping at the base and too short for me (when I got it it was the perfect height for me, a 6ft man). I would also note that the armrests face a little too far outwards to be of any use; there is a gap between my elbows and the armrests.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these pillows with the neck support and was very impressed with the comfort after it decompressed. Very comfortable and the memory foam stuffing was so full any more stuffing would have burst the seams! I bought a second one and after letting it decompress......it's....not. The stuffing is very lacking in the second one. Fortunately I requested a return and they're sending me a new one. Will try to remember to update this review when the replacement arrives, but so long as I get a second one like the first, I have no problem calling this a 5 star item!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Farnum

customer_reviews.title: Full, firm and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I have seen reviews on some of these type of pillows with pictures showing that the foam does not fill the casing, leaving it floppy or misshapen, so I was a little hesitant to get a memory foam version of this. This one came rolled up tight but we left it alone for 24 hours, fluffing the arms at the bend, after a few hours, and then leaving it to continue to expand. It has filled up completely and firmly. Good quality and will probably be buying another one for my other son.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best Product....
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little odd to get use to, mostly because it takes a while to fully form and expand to it’s shape. It’s not necessarily firm or too supportive when sitting in bed. Most of the foam condenses in the lower half of the pillow, meaning the lower part is a lot more dense that the upper part. The upper part is where you need more of the support though. You’ll definitely need some additional pillows to find the exact support you want.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurer431

customer_reviews.title: I expected a uniformly solid pillow that holds its shape ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected a uniformly solid pillow that holds its shape. Instead, the pillow is stuffed with chunks that migrate around. It slightly improved after 24 hours as the chunks expanded, but I don’t expect further improvement. I’ll wait another day to be sure, but I’ll likely return.
customer_reviews.author: Aardvark

customer_reviews.title: Could that Smell Get Worse?
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would make the perfect reading pillow. Not so. The minuted I opened the package I regretted having bought it. I'm sensitive to smells, and this pillow's chemical scent irritated my nose, and I wound up with a sore throat, to boot. Cumbersome pillow, and hard on my back (felt like I was sitting against a rock!). What did I like about the pillow? The arms; they, were comfortable, that's it. Regret buying this product. Not re-gifting it for Christmas. Threw it away!
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Get the normal sized one
customer_reviews.text: I understand the pics on amazon have pillows that you're scared might be too small, but the first option would be the best option. I made the mistake of ordering the huge one and though its comfy and covers a lot more than I expected, this thing is HEAVY. About 20 pounds. I just move it every morning and night from my pillow to the floor and its always a struggle. Especially when I'm tired and don't feel like moving. If that sounds like you I think the normal one would be enough to be comfortable against the bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly

customer_reviews.title: Big time comfort for bargain price
customer_reviews.text: It came in a very long rectangular box “padded” by some paper, although padding is really just courtesy rather than a necessity for something like this. When I unpacked it, it was extremely condensed, but after a brief fluff and a few minutes it was good to go. The texture is comfortingly soft, with stitching on the inside to prevent any discomfort. I game on my PS4 from my bed, and this is the perfect thing to lean up against while doing so. The arm rests help keep it centered behind me, as well as providing a convenient elbow rest I didn’t think I’d care about.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: It has a weird angle to it that’s not very comfortable, smaller than appeared and would be impossible to ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t purchase this again. It has a weird angle to it that’s not very comfortable, smaller than appeared and would be impossible to return in the same packaging as it is shrink wrapped. Purchased to use after surgery so I could sit up while sleeping, uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bedrest pillow! i used to stack pillows behind me, and they weren't really that comfortable. This is SO comfy! Venus loves it too. I came up the other day and found her getting ready to take her nap :-) I didn't have any problems with odor like others mentioned, and I have an extremely sensitive sense of smell. Also, I really didn't have a problem with it expanding to it's full size. I highly recommend this, if not for you, for your kitties! LOL
customer_reviews.author: catchickenlady

customer_reviews.title: Supportive but odorific
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my spouse, and we both love the support, especially having bought size w/ headrest, which seems to be critical to getting full support for reading in bed. I have now aired it outside for perhaps 12 hours over several days. I'm fine with being able to ignore the odor (of the stuffing, I guess), but my wife is not yet on board. It's been out of the box for more than a week. Only time will tell if this will become a fabulous support for her back -- or something that sits in a spare bedroom due to the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Spraig

customer_reviews.title: Not so useful as planned
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased this and other comfort and assistance devices when my late husband was receiving home care and physical therapy. He found it difficult to use and not supportive enough for sitting up in bed. It is very heavy and awkward to position. But my teenage grandchildren do use it when they visit. It's their cell phone "booth"; so I am keeping it at least for now.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened up the box, I was a little concerned that I may have gotten a defected pillow. I looked at the other comments and apparently they were right, the pillow fluffs up on its own after about 2 days. This pillow is actually worth every penny. It supports my back against the wall while reading and doing homework. My niece tried to steal this pillow but I promised her I would get her one for her for Christmas. WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Update - Can't get comfortable with this thing
customer_reviews.text: Initially, it seemed OK. It's soft, and seems to have the correct shape. However for extended reading, it's just not comfortable for me. The height is one factor that just kills it. It's JUST tall enough to both not support my head, and make an additional head rest uncomfortable. It also has a tendency to kind of shift it's mass as you lean on it, the result being your bottom pushed progressively further forward. I wanted to like it, I tried to like it, eventually it just wound up being unused, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pillow for me to relax against while doing work on my computer or at my college. While comfortable, supportive and soft, I feel that the dimensions and angles of the pillow could be improved a bit more. Overall though, I was very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very soft but firm!
customer_reviews.text: So I waited a few weeks before I decided to write this review! I LOVE this pillow! I purchased the XL because I just had a feeling my 6-5ft husband would want to give it a try. But not only does he love the pillow my two kids do also. So we will probably do a bit of re-ordering. If you are sensitive to smells then maybe at first you won’t like the foam/chemical like smell but it’s definitely not as bad as some reviewers said. I have not needed to re fluff or anything and I use it sitting up in bed every night.
customer_reviews.author: The Aleet

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the standard size which was way too small for my boyfriend. The exchange for the larger size was easy to complete. The larger size works great for the boyfriend who is not even a very large man. I, myself, would not even prefer the standard size and I am a woman. Unless you are a petite male or petite female, then the larger size is going to feel the most satisfying. We both have an average size body frame. This made a great Christmas gift and choosing the extra $5 gift wrap option was not disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M. Strickling

customer_reviews.title: This was a THUD for me
customer_reviews.text: Of all the products I've ordered from Amazon, this was my greatest disappointment. I made the mistake of ordering the larger size. It weighs a ton & is hard for me to move or reposition from the bed to the couch. The stuffing settles from gravity & nothing helps except turning it upside down to resettle. It's become a real eye sore in my bedroom. I would definitely not buy again or recommend to a friend. I would've returned except I couldn't get it back into the box it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: AerieView

customer_reviews.title: The best support pillow for baby feeding/reading/tv watching in bed
customer_reviews.text: I have had the large size navy support pillow for over 2 years. I am laying on it as I type this. I wanted something sizeable, supportive, and with a tasteful color and material for when my baby came and I knew I would often be sitting up in my bed at night. I will absolutely buy this again. The large size will work for a large, tall man as well as it does for me, an average sized woman. Great gift if someone needs to be in bed often or is a new mom (feeding support at night).
customer_reviews.author: Maespo44

customer_reviews.title: It's just... OK
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what you'd think it would do, but it's REALLY heavy so not easily moved by someone smaller. The large version is definitely not something you'd easily toss around but would be a fine addition to somewhere you were planning on working for a while because it's quite sturdy and gives a lot of support.
customer_reviews.author: upso

customer_reviews.title: Not Particularly Comfortable or Functional
customer_reviews.text: I am staying temporarily where my bed has no headboard which makes it extremely difficult to prop up for reading or even watching television in bed so I thought one of these things would be a solution. Perhaps others are but this one doesn't as it isn't particularly comfortable and I can't seem to get it to function as a back rest. Perhaps others would have better luck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amarante

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable !!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter as she spends so much time in her bed studying. Her posture is terrible when using her lap top or reading. . She has been using this for a few day’s and loves it ! Provides great support and is very comfortable. I was afraid if would be too large for her and almost purchased the smaller one. She is 5 feet tall and fits her perfectly. Product is very sturdy and of good quality. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Arztpt

customer_reviews.title: Not up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews, I bought one. It started out well enough, but after awhile the lack of head support bothered me and I found myself sliding down and I would have to keep adjusting my position. Also after a few weeks of using it, I realise it would be so much better if I could remove the cover to wash. At first the idea of not washing it appealed to the lazy me but in reality, it is eventually going to need more than just wipe downs.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Low

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived flat and rolled up, but had very good instructions (in good English too). As soon as we started cutting the vacuum sealed bag it started to relax some. Instructions say wait 24-48 hours for full return to normal shape. We didn’t have to wait 24...we fluffed and it needed a little time linger and by that night it was fully fluffed on its own. I remember these pillows for reading or watching TV in bed and now we have one! These are great pillows and the back support is great. We love ours!
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Received it fast & Looks just like the picture. Fabric is really soft and comfy, really pretty blue color. We let it expand for 24 hours before trying it. It did have a slight smell at first but it quickly dissipated. SUPER comfy. I snuggle right down and can lay my head back. Honestly I think I could fall asleep on it (which I do ALL the time while reading!) I could also use it as a punching pillow in those frustrated Mom moments. Lol! Overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stocking

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after returning the “Husband Pillow “ I purchased it based ona lot of feedback in regards to my husbands size as well as he will soon be recuperating from surgery. It was nothing they said I felt truly let down. A week later I purchased this beauty I could not believe the difference. The quality, the size. And less than the other. I purchased the xtra large and would recommend that size to anyone who wants to sink into supptive heaven over 5’10. Thank you linenspa for putting a look of pure joy, and stress relief when he gets home and sinks into luxury. The blue is beautiful to,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: when they say wait 48 hours, they mean it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfy reading pillow with robust back support, something that could be used by itself rather than having to always be leaned against a couch or wall. I chose this one and after 24 hours of letting the pillow expand I was disappointed with the amount of give it had when I leaned on it. Not functional at all for keeping me mostly upright. But after a full 48 hours, it had really filled out and is totally deserving of a 5-star rating. Good back support and the memory foam is very cushy while keeping a firm shape. It's exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: This was surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: After unboxing I was unsure how it would turn out but true to recommendations, after two days it fluffs up and becomes super full. The shredded memory foam is wonderful to lean against and to shape and mold to your comfort. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have neck and back issues due to multiple car injuries so I purchased for support when sitting up in bed to read, use my laptop, and watch movies with a projector. The memory foam provides excellent support. The arms are also comfy enough for me to lay my head on when I'm lying flat on my back. I let the pillow expand for about a day and a half before using it. Would recommend this to anyone who needs support or who wants to master the lazy life. Oh and my dog approves of it
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. But not as good as needed.
customer_reviews.text: It is recommended to allow 48 hours to expand. Mine didn't noticeably change from unboxing. To sit up in bed. I find I have to pull this forward and tilt it back to be comfortable sitting. Fragrance isn't too bad but it has a foam smell for sure. I would give another star if they had a leg bar and head bar for tall persons. A pouch on both arms would be nice to hold things like a remote and a book. You pay for their largest size and only gain minor change.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: So comfy, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is one quality pillow, comfortable, and GIANT. Very high quality materials, comfortable to curl up with my bible in bed for hours. Only downside is it is quite heavy to move (thank you for adding a handle to the top) and it takes up a lot of space so dedicate an area for it!! Havent washed yet, but it keeps dog hair off it amazingly compared to everything else I own. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Blakley

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: No matter what i do the top 1/3 wont stay filled, there just isnt simply enough fill to expand and make entire unit full. No way to access and add either. Flipping it over and massaging it to get some support up top just collapses on you when you turn it back over. Just ok product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between this and buying 2 pillows. I decided to give this a shot because I wanted to be able to sit up comfortably in bed. This is exactly what I've been looking for and I wish I bought this sooner. It feels amazing to lean against this when I have lower back pain. Great for relaxing and watching videos on a laptop or my phone! Recommended this one to the family.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Soft but NO back support
customer_reviews.text: The item is super soft but lacks in the support area. I was looking for a pillow that would support my back while feeding my newborn. This pillow is a bit too soft and provides no real back support for me. I gave it 48 hours to completely form (even popped it in the dryer) and it still is to squishy. Plus, I paid extra for the "neck support" which is just a flimsy piece that offers me absolutely zero neck support. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Too Big and Awkward
customer_reviews.text: This reading pillow is really soft and attractive, but it is much too big and heavy. It's cumbersome to lug from room to room. It takes up too much space. I prefer a reading pillow that I bought at Target years ago because it's light weight, easy to move and washable. This big one is not washable and weighs a ton. I regret buying two of these for my teenage boys. My strapping boys find these too big and clunky. It's much too oversized and more of a novelty item.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: I did not find this pillow comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow because I need to sleep somewhat upright. I've had it for a week now. I did not find this pillow comfortable at all, not even to just sit and watch TV for a while. Also, I did not realize how MASSIVE it would be. And after it settles, the arms open up to a degree you cannot close them up some, to make it smaller. A total mess. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Latinfrizz

customer_reviews.title: My only regret is, I didn’t buy sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve bought this years ago, but didn’t want to spend the money. I finally Got tired Propping up pillows behind my back and continually having to readjust them for comfort for my lower back. With this new back pillow I no longer have to keep adjusting pillows. After removing the back pillow from the airtight bag I only had to pat and shake the inside foam into all the areas needed and within 90 minutes The back pillow expanded to full-size as you can see in the images I have uploaded.
customer_reviews.author: tfanci

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy but also smelly
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today -- it fluffed up pretty quickly but the foam is quite clumpy inside and it has some a strong mildew/mold odor, which I'm not sure how to get rid of since it's not machine-washable. I'm hoping that it will air out and get better, but as it is right now, I hesitate to use it...
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for any occasion including surgery.
customer_reviews.text: It's comfy and very supportive. I recommend anyone to buy this, I actually bought it right after a spine surgery and don't know how much I'd suffer without the comfort of sustaining my body without something this soft and fitting to my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comfort!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, I love big pappa ( that’s what I call this pillow) I have had the most comfortable sleep since receiving this pillow!!! My husband is kinda jealous of the connection we share, lol 😂! He’ll get over it! Some people were saying it had a weird smell but I didn’t get that at all. Just smelled like it came out of a warehouse. I sprayed it with some Febreze and haven’t had a problem with the smell at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kkayallday24/7

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless, offers zero support
customer_reviews.text: Since the filling is scraps of memory foam, the pillow gets flat within minutes of leaning on it. I’m an average weight person, and this pillow offers zero support and gets flat and deformed with every use. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is finally an extra large of its kind that is affordable and comfortable. The biggest thing I noticed about this size vs the medium was the extra long arm rests which I like. For an adult who is 6ft, this is the right sized pillow, anything smaller would be too small. The only suggestion I would make for a feature improvement is to put pockets on the pillow in the back to store things, or even small side zippers would do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: AZDesertMonsoons89

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a grown-up
customer_reviews.text: Meh. My biggest gripe is that the compressed foam never did really expand to fill out the whole cover, so it looks much more saggy than the photograph. And it's smaller altogether than I had imagined it would be. Nice fabric, well constructed, would probably be just perfect for a child. I'm a relatively skinny 5'7" and it's just too small to give the kind of support I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: estelle47

customer_reviews.title: Linenspa Shredded Foam Reading Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backrest for my bed after I had shoulder surgery. This was the top-rated backrest. It's very supportive and quite heavy, but is not soft and comfy right out of the box. I probably did not need to order x-large because the arms are spread far apart. If you are a "larger person" then you would want an x-large. It is more comfortable now that Ive used it several times.
customer_reviews.author: PinkGirl51

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to my lower back.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, after reading some of the reviews, I was very skeptical with making this purchase, however, I decided to give it a try and so glad I did. I did not experience the odor as some others did. Upon unpacking, I did place it in a warm room, as suggested, for it to inflate. It feels so good to my back. Hopefully this will alleviate my lower back pain from sitting on my favorite chair.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for nighttime feedings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for nursing my newborn in bed, since we don’t have a cushioned headboard and stacking pillows just wasn’t cutting it 6-8 times a night! This is a great size for me, at 5’7. We’re in a king sized bed and it’s still roomy, even with a co-sleeper between us. I still require a pillow to lean my head back as the back doesn’t come up quite high enough, though. The arms are also quite low, so I still use a boppy. But once I’ve set up this pillow is super comfy. The fabric is soft and foam is densely filled but not hard. Overall I’m happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Family

customer_reviews.title: Extra Large is HARD & HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a large woman, 5 ft tall, 118 lbs. The size of the pillow is ok, I got the extra large. The pillow is ROCK HARD and HEAVY. Maybe this only applies to the extra large but it's certainly worth mentioning. The pillow is very well made with quality fabric and will wear well. The pillow (more like a cushion) is definitely too firm for me. I have to use a pillow behind me to be comfortable. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mood Swings

customer_reviews.title: Too big and too soft.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large size and honestly it's too big. I bought it with the intention of using it both on the floor in in bed. Honestly, it's too big to use in the bed unless you're the only person in that bed. As far as using it on the floor, it's almost too soft for it to provide any support at all. If I'd have seen it in a store I'd have known it wasn't exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: W. Harp

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have sciatica and a herniated disc and the side of my chairs are starting to wear out so I have to use a pillow or something for the sides of my chair and back so I got tired of using a regular pillow and decided to try this. you have to give it time to fluff up( about 2 days) to get the right full size. Its very soft. And comfortable. The only thing that I don't like is the open part where your butt goes. Wise it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Lynch family

customer_reviews.title: Soft, yet firm, support!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who likes to use his mobile for gaming. We don't have room for a gaming chair, so this is perfect. I got the XL version and it did not disappoint. It's great for watching TV or reading in bed. The memory foam is soft, yet it's full and firm enough for support. The cover is very soft and silky and there was no odor from the foam after it fully expanded and aired out for a couple hours. It's much better than the ones I've seen in stores that are too small for an adult to fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow comes vacuumed packed and does not expand. It remains a floppy pillow It is more like a stuffed animal than a reading pillow. Literally zero support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was having surgery and I knew I needed to be propped up. I put a smaller pillow on the inside of the arms and it was absolutely perfect! I have also now taken it and use it on the couch when I’m watching movies. I like to be propped up. Highly recommend this awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: OMG, these are the ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on the positive reviews. OMG, we LOVE LOVE LOVE them! I do wish you could take off the outside to wash them. We'll need to be careful not to get anything on them. They are WORTH the money! It does take 2 days to refluff after unpacking. I left them in the garage until they were fully aired out and fluffed. LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.author: Anet P Granger

customer_reviews.title: Great extra support while breastfeeding!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I am currently breastfeeding my second child and needed extra back and arm support for those nighttime feeds. This is amazing! The back is super comfy and supportive and the arms add extra support for my boppy pillow, keeping my hands free! (Which for me is essential to staying awake because I can scroll the internet) def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas 2017. My other three kids liked it so much I had to buy three more for Christmas 2018. All are used daily and are drug around the entire house. All have held up well. I’ve been know to sneak one and use it as well...very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Not very supportive
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could read in bed since I don’t have a headboard. It has to be leaning against something. The arms never fully expanded and are very floppy. Also, if you are tall, it won’t provide the support you want even if it is leaning against a wall or headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Must use against a vertical surface!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great reading pillow. However, 4-star review because it does not fully serve my need. I use this on my bed where the back does not rest on anything. This then lead to this pillow collapsing rather easily. However, using this against any vertical surface makes this the perfect pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo B.

product_meta.title: Linenspa Soft Velour Cover Shredded Foam Reading Pillow, X-Large, Navy
feature_bullets: Extra-large size is great for teens and adults; perfect for gaming, reading, relaxing, watching TV, and working on a laptop
Filled with a CertiPUR-US certified shredded memory foam blend that can be molded for personalized and lasting comfort; 3-year warranty
Soft and durable velour cover is available in navy and stone colors that work well in any room; spot clean only
Superior back and shoulder support great for recovery from surgery and other injuries; convenient fabric carry handle
Arrives compressed and rolled in a box; shake and fluff, then allow up to 48 hours for full expansion

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,384 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 3-year U.S. warranty protects against manufacturer defects
